strategy_reasoning: Using the 'garden upgrade' metaphor fits our organic brand identity while translating technical backend updates (OVH migration, new models) into cozy, visual milestones. The retro game aesthetic appeals to our dev-heavy audience without feeling corporate.
visual_style: Cozy 8-bit pixel art, Studio Ghibli meets retro gaming. Chunky sprites, soft lighting, lime green (#ecf874) accents, and pastel gradients.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute round bee mascot (yellow body, brown stripes, pink blush, small wings) discovering two glowing magical seeds in a lush pixel garden. One seed radiates cinematic light (video), the other swirls with colors (image). Soft lime green (#ecf874) and peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font at top: 'NEW SEEDS'. Nostalgic, emotionally warm.
images.description: Announcing LTX-2 and Imagen 3 as new 'seeds' in our creative garden.

images.prompt: Retro 8-bit pixel art of the bee mascot zooming happily alongside a sparkling, crystal-clear pixelated stream. The water flows smoothly (representing stable streams/SSE). Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender sky. Speed lines behind the bee indicate faster processing. Modern soft lighting on chunky pixels. Text in pixel font: 'SMOOTH FLOW'. Wholesome, like A Short Hike. Peaceful but dynamic.
images.description: Visualizing the technical fixes (SSE support, zero queues) as a smooth, flowing stream.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art UI screen, designed like a retro RPG status menu. Displays a 'Brain Power' stat bar filling up (Claude Opus 4.6 upgrade) and a 'Map' icon (Dashboard tiers). The bee mascot gives a thumbs up in the corner. Background is soft lime green (#ecf874) with cream borders. Clean pixel icons. Text in pixel font: 'LEVEL UP'. Nostalgic gaming vibes, clean interface.
images.description: Showcasing the Claude upgrade and Dashboard tier visibility as a character stat boost.
